date_from.title: Date From
date_from.description: The date from when these properties are active. If these properties follow a change, then this Date From should equal the previous Date To.

date_to.title: Date To
date_to.description: The date to when these properties are active.

update_at.title: Date of Update
update_at.description: The date these properties were last updated.

title: IEA Wind Resource Assessment Data Model
description: This Data Model schema is a digital representation of a meteorological mast used for measureing the wind resource of a potential wind farm.

author.title: Author
author.description: The person who created this file.

organisation.title: Organisation
organisation.description: The organisation the Author is from.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date this file was created.

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the IEA WRA Data Model his file is based on. The format of this follows Semantic Versioning with the year and month tag on after. E.g. 1.1.1-2020.07

plant_name.title: Plant Name
plant_name.description: The name of the wind farm this met mast is associated with.

plant_type.title: Plant Type
plant_type.description: The type of renewable generation plant it is.

measurement_location.title: Measurement Location
measurement_location.description: This is the geographic location of the meteorological measurement station i.e. a met mast/tower or remote sensing device.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name given to the measurement location i.e. to the met mast or remote sensing device.

latitude_ddeg.title: Latitude [ddeg]
latitude_ddeg.description: Latitude coordinate in the Geographic Coordinate System using the WGS84 datum in decimal degrees. Latitude lines are parallel to the equator where their position ranges from -90 degrees at the south pole to 90 degrees at the north pole.

longitude_ddeg.title: Longitude [ddeg]
longitude_ddeg.description: Longitude coordinate in the Geographic Coordinate System using the WGS84 datum in decimal degrees. Longitude lines are perpendicular to the equator where their position ranges from 0° at Greenwich Mean Time increasing to +180° as you move eastward and decreasing to −180° as you move westward.

measurement_station_type_id.title: Measurement Station Type
measurement_station_type_id.description: The type of measurement station. This must be one of either mast, lidar or sodar.

measurement_point.title: Measurement Point
measurement_point.description: This represents a point in space where a measurement takes place.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name the measurement point is commonly referred to. This is the name that is used to refer to the data in an analysis and reporting.

measurement_type_id.title: Measurement Type
measurement_type_id.description: The type of measurement been made.

height_m.title: Height [m]
height_m.description: The height (in meters) above ground level the measurement is taking place.

sensor_config.title: Sensor Configuration
sensor_config.description: The sensor configuration that is programmed into the logging device.

slope.title: Logger Slope
slope.description: The slope programmed into the logger.

offset.title: Logger Offset
offset.description: The offset programmed into the logger.

sensitivity.title: Logger Sensitivity
sensitivity.description: The sensitivity programmed into the logger.

measurement_units.title: Measurement Units
measurement_units.description: The measurement units of the values the sensor records.

height_m.title: Logger Height [m]
height_m.description: The height (in meters) programmed into the logger.

serial_number.title: Serial Number
serial_number.description: The serial number of the sensor programmed into the logger.

connection_channel.title: Connection Channel
connection_channel.description: The connection channel the sensor is wired into on the logger.

column_name.title: Column Names
column_name.description: The group of column names in the data file which relates to this sensor configuration.

column_name.title: Column Name
column_name.description: The column name in the data file which relates to this sensor configuration.

metric_id.title: Metric
metric_id.description: The metric or aggregation function e.g. 'average' or 'maximum' that this column records.

is_ignored.title: Is Ignored
is_ignored.description: If you want to ignore this column name, set to True.

mounting_arrangement.title: Mounting Arrangement
mounting_arrangement.description: This describes how the sensor is mounted onto the met mast.

mast_section_geometry_uuid.title: Mast Section Geometry UUID
mast_section_geometry_uuid.description: The uuid to link this Measurement Point's mounting arrangement to the Mast Section Geometry.

mounting_type_id.title: Mounting Type
mounting_type_id.description: The mounting type the sensor is mounted onto the mast e.g. an anemometer top mounted above the mast or a pair of anemometers mounted in the goal post configuration.

boom_orientation_deg.title: Boom Orientation [deg]
boom_orientation_deg.description: The boom orientation of the horizontal boom the sensor is mounted on.

vane_dead_band_orientation_deg.title: Vane Dead Band Orientation [deg]
vane_dead_band_orientation_deg.description: The wind vane dead band orientation.

orientation_reference_id.title: Orientation Reference
orientation_reference_id.description: The orientation reference the booms and vane dead band are measured against. E.g. magnetic north.

tilt_angle_deg.title: Tilt Angle [deg]
tilt_angle_deg.description: The tilt angle of either the vertical upstand the sensor is mounted on.

upstand_height_mm.title: Upstand Height [mm]
upstand_height_mm.description: The height, measured in millimeters, of the upstand.

upstand_diameter_mm.title: Upstand Diameter [mm]
upstand_diameter_mm.description: The diameter, measured in millimeters, of the upstand.

boom_diameter_mm.title: Boom Diameter [mm]
boom_diameter_mm.description: The diameter, measured in millimeters, of the boom.

boom_length_mm.title: Boom Length [mm]
boom_length_mm.description: The length, measured in millimeters, of the boom.

distance_from_mast_to_sensor_mm.title: Distance Mast to Sensor [mm]
distance_from_mast_to_sensor_mm.description: The distance, measured in millimeters, of edge of the mast to the center of the sensor.
